name: Cook the Book: Spinach Salad with Strawberries and Nectarines
description: Photograph from J. McPherson on Flickr I go out to eat a lot and one of my favorite things to do in a fancy restaurant is to order the mixed greens salad. It might sound boring but I think how...
recipeIngredient: 6 cups lightly packed, bite-size pieces fresh spinach

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss together the spinach, nectarines, and strawberries.
In a small bowl, stir together the oil, lemon juice, vinegar, sugar, and dry mustard. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Sprinkle with sunflower seeds and serve.
Variation: Substitute peaches for the nectarines and raspberries for the strawberries.
